Functions
init_snek
init_snek:
Brief

Initialize snek with SNEK_INITIAL_SIZE

Params
x0

snek base address

x1

x pos

x2

y pos

snek_push
snek_push:
Brief

Push a coord pair into the snek

Params
x0

snek base address

x1

x pos

x2

y pos

Notes

The size of the snek should be less than its capacity
